title: Jigoku Sensei Nube: Gozen 0 Ji Nube Shisu!
original_name: 地獄先生ぬ～べ～　午前 0 時ぬ～べ～死す！！
sinopse: New student comes to Nube class. His name is Jun and he's a lonely boy who loves clowns very much. His only friend is a Pierre - clown in the mirror. And one night Pierre gives Jun a mask with strange abilities. At that point Jun starts to act strange and lot of accidents occur in the school.
